abstract.para: Start the FreeRADIUS on the server after installation.

topic.para: After the bootstrap is complete, start the server in debugging mode as a root user.
To do this, run the following command:

note.para: Start the FreeRADIUS server in debugging mode only for testing. Other than for testing, use sudo systemctl start freeradius

topic.screen: &promt.sudo; radiusd -X [...] Listening on auth address * port 1812 bound to server default Listening on acct address * port 1813 bound to server default Listening on auth address :: port 1812 bound to server default Listening on acct address :: port 1813 bound to server default Listening on auth address 127.0.0.1 port 18120 bound to server inner-tunnel Listening on proxy address * port 54435 Listening on proxy address :: port 58415 Ready to process requests
topic.para: The Listening and Ready to process requests appear when the server starts correctly.
